FlavorTextOption.Text: A breakthrough in deep space scanning has been made. As a result we are now able to detect previously unknown Nodes of Antimatter and Elerium. This has both our Miners and our Military very excited.
We should try and claim these new Resources before our enemeies would make weapons from them. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +15)[/COLOR]
Such valuable resource should not be left untapped. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +15)[/COLOR]
Our military can always make use of both Elerium and Antimatter. We should claim them at all cost. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +15)[/COLOR]
